DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to obtain safety information on cigarette smokers treated with 52 weeks of varenicline regardless of smoking status.
DOC.brief_title: A 52-Week Placebo-Controlled Study Evaluating the Safety of Varenicline
DOC.criteria: Subjects must have smoked an average of at least 10 cigarettes per day during the past year and over the month prior to the screening visit, with no period of abstinence greater than 3 months in the past year. Subjects with clinically significant, recent cardiovascular disease.
